name: Sakura Runner
description:
Play as Silvervales wolf Daiya as she runs in the sakura canopy, jumping between branches in this relaxing infinite runner featuring music by Silvervale and Shanty Shark.

Controls:

Jump up with "W", up arrow, or clicking above Daiya, jump down with "S", down arrow or clicking below Daiya.

Music:

  • Title: Keeping Clean
  • Creator: Silvervale and Shanty Shark
  • Source: Spotify
  • License:  CC BY 4.0
